name: Boxboy on the hunt for the Evil Punch Icon
name_original: Boxboy on the hunt for the Evil Punch Icon
description:
Yay! My first completed game.  Was done for Mini Jam 40 (Theme: Hunters).

Try your best and catch the Evil Punch Icon! And yeah, the game is not endless! ^^

Controlls:

Left mouse button - jump;

Rightmouse button - shoot;

Wheel mouse button - slow motion;

________________________________________________

I wanted to implemet procedural generation but because of the lack of knowledge and experience it worked super badly.

Unfortunatelly, it is not really about hunting, but avoiding obstacles. Also, because wheel button is used for slow motion, WebGL can't really be used. So, Linux/Mac users sorry for that :(
